show_name: Captain Tsubasa: Asu ni Mukatte Hashire! (movie 3)
other_title: Captain Tsubasa Film 04: Rennt und erreicht eure Zukunft! (German)
Captain Tsubasa Movie 04: Run to catch the tomorrow!
Captain Tsubasa Película 04: Corre para alcanzar el mañana! (Spanish)
Holly e Benji: Corri per il domani! (Italian)
Los Supercampeones: En busca de un mejor mañana (Spanish)
Olive et Tom Film 3: La Coupe du monde - la sélection (French)
Oliver y Benji: Camino al Mundial (Spanish)
キャプテン翼 明日に向って走れ！ (Japanese)
plot: The fourth Captain Tsubasa movie is basically about a training match of the All Japan Boy Soccer Team, but most of the time you see flashbacks of former matches, for instance the final match Nankatsu vs. Toho or when Wakabayashi challenges team captains of different sports.
